title: Sick puppy [Widescreen]
creator_credit: Bruce Hancock, Sally Chesher and Bellwether Films
brief_description: A young boy’s puppy is dying. Anxious not to distress him, his father promises to take him to the circus (All New Moscow Circus) if worst comes to worst. A surprising short about mortality, parenthood and priorities. Cast includes Helen Thomson, David Woodley and Carl Snell.
